availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p:
Caldwell County, Kentucky, attorney. Orange County, Virginia, native. Married to Mary B. Edwards Livingston in Todd County, Kentucky, on July 9, 1829. Father of Georgiana W. Lindsay Shropshire. Graduate of the University of Virginia in Charlottesville, Virginia.
Resident in Hopkinsville, Kentucky, in 1830. Owned three enslaved persons in Hopkinsville in 1830. Attorney in Hopkinsville. Teacher in Princeton. Attorney in Caldwell County in 1850. Attorney in LaGrange, Texas, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
